comments.author: Jennifer
comments.body: I can't help but wistfully dream of one day having a new york accent, a tattered time capsule, and the suit of a newscaster. -yenni

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I thought that _was_ a NY accent, J. Lower east side near Mason Street. No? South central? Also, sorry to see SB under the weather again. He seemed healthy enough in 4Mile today, albeit a little wobbly. I just thought he was flasked again. (I've learned to follow him at twenty bike lengths, though sometimes _that's_ not enough.) Feel better, Bro'!
